Main.warnLicenseExceeded: You've reached the limit for simultaneous connections to %1 editors. This document will be opened for viewing only. Contact your administrator to learn more.
Main.warnLicenseUsersExceeded: You've reached the user limit for %1 editors. Contact your administrator to learn more.
Main.warnNoLicense: You've reached the limit for simultaneous connections to %1 editors. This document will be opened for viewing only. Contact %1 sales team for personal upgrade terms.
Main.warnNoLicenseUsers: You've reached the user limit for %1 editors. Contact %1 sales team for personal upgrade terms.
Main.warnLicenseLimitedNoAccess: License expired. You have no access to document editing functionality. Please contact your administrator.
Main.warnLicenseLimitedRenewed:
License needs to be renewed. You have a limited access to document editing functionality.
Please contact your administrator to get full access
Main.textCustomLoader: Please note that according to the terms of the license you are not entitled to change the loader. Please contact our Sales Department to get a quote.
Main.textHasMacros:
The file contains automatic macros.
Do you want to run macros?
Main.leavePageText: You have unsaved changes in this document. Click 'Stay on this Page' to await the autosave of the document. Click 'Leave this Page' to discard all the unsaved changes.
Main.errorUpdateVersion: The file version has been changed. The page will be reloaded.
Main.errorServerVersion: The editor version has been updated. The page will be reloaded to apply the changes.
Main.warnProcessRightsChange: You have been denied the right to edit the file.
Main.errorAccessDeny:
You are trying to perform an action you do not have rights for.
Please contact your Document Server administrator.

LongActions.confirmMoveCellRange: The destination cell`s range can contain data. Continue the operation?
LongActions.confirmPutMergeRange:
The source data contains merged cells.
They will be unmerged before they are pasted into the table.
LongActions.confirmReplaceFormulaInTable:
Formulas in the header row will be removed and converted to static text.
Do you want to continue?

Error.openErrorText: An error has occurred while opening the file
Error.saveErrorText: An error has occurred while saving the file
Error.errorViewerDisconnect:
Connection is lost. You can still view the document,
but will not be able to download until the connection is restored and page is reloaded.
Error.errorFilePassProtect: The file is password protected and could not be opened.
Error.errorStockChart:
Incorrect row order. To build a stock chart place the data on the sheet in the following order:
opening price, max price, min price, closing price.
Error.errorDatabaseConnection:
External error.
Database connection error. Please, contact support.
Error.errorUserDrop: The file cannot be accessed right now.
Error.errorConnectToServer:
The document could not be saved. Please check connection settings or contact your administrator.
When you click the 'OK' button, you will be prompted to download the document.
Error.errorSessionAbsolute: The document editing session has expired. Please reload the page.
Error.errorSessionIdle: The document has not been edited for quite a long time. Please reload the page.
Error.errorSessionToken: The connection to the server has been interrupted. Please reload the page.
Error.errorDataEncrypted: Encrypted changes have been received, they cannot be deciphered.
Error.errorAccessDeny:
You are trying to perform an action you do not have rights for.
Please contact your Document Server administrator.
Error.errorEditingDownloadas:
An error occurred during the work with the document.
Use the 'Download' option to save the file backup copy to your computer hard drive.
Error.errorFileSizeExceed:
The file size exceeds the limitation set for your server.
Please contact your Document Server administrator for details.
Error.errorUpdateVersionOnDisconnect:
Internet connection has been restored, and the file version has been changed.
Before you can continue working, you need to download the file or copy its content to make sure nothing is lost, and then reload this page.
Error.criticalErrorExtText: Press 'OK' to back to document list.
Error.scriptLoadError: The connection is too slow, some of the components could not be loaded. Please reload the page.
Error.pastInMergeAreaError: Cannot change part of a merged cell
Error.errorWrongBracketsCount:
Found an error in the formula entered.
Wrong cout of brackets.
Error.errorWrongOperator:
An error in the entered formula. Wrong operator is used.
Please correct the error or use the Esc button to cancel the formula editing.
Error.errorCountArgExceed:
Found an error in the formula entered.
Count of arguments exceeded.
Error.errorCountArg:
Found an error in the formula entered.
Invalid number of arguments.
Error.errorFormulaName:
Found an error in the formula entered.
Incorrect formula name.
Error.errorFormulaParsing: Internal error while the formula parsing.
Error.errorArgsRange:
Found an error in the formula entered.
Incorrect arguments range.
Error.errorUnexpectedGuid:
External error.
Unexpected Guid. Please, contact support.
Error.errorFileRequest:
External error.
File Request. Please, contact support.
Error.errorFileVKey:
External error.
Incorrect securety key. Please, contact support.
Error.errorMaxPoints: The maximum number of points in series per chart is 4096.
Error.errorOperandExpected: The entered function syntax is not correct. Please check if you are missing one of the parentheses - '(' or ')'.
Error.errorMoveRange: Cann't change a part of merged cell
Error.errorAutoFilterDataRange:
The operation could not be done for the selected range of cells.
Select a uniform data range inside or outside the table and try again.
Error.errorAutoFilterChangeFormatTable:
The operation could not be done for the selected cells as you cannot move a part of the table.
Select another data range so that the whole table was shifted and try again.
Error.errorAutoFilterChange: The operation is not allowed, as it is attempting to shift cells in a table on your worksheet.
Error.errorAutoFilterHiddenRange:
The operation cannot be performed because the area contains filtered cells.
Please unhide the filtered elements and try again.
Error.errorFillRange:
Could not fill the selected range of cells.
All the merged cells need to be the same size.
Error.errorInvalidRef: Enter a correct name for the selection or a valid reference to go to.
Error.errorCreateDefName:
The existing named ranges cannot be edited and the new ones cannot be created
at the moment as some of them are being edited.
Error.errorPasteMaxRange: The copy and paste area does not match. Please select an area with the same size or click the first cell in a row to paste the copied cells.
Error.errorLockedAll: The operation could not be done as the sheet has been locked by another user.
Error.errorLockedWorksheetRename: The sheet cannot be renamed at the moment as it is being renamed by another user
Error.errorOpenWarning:
The length of one of the formulas in the file exceeded
the allowed number of characters and it was removed.
Error.errorFrmlWrongReferences:
The function refers to a sheet that does not exist.
Please check the data and try again.
Error.errorCopyMultiselectArea:
This command cannot be used with multiple selections.
Select a single range and try again.
Error.errorPrintMaxPagesCount:
Unfortunately, it’s not possible to print more than 1500 pages at once in the current version of the program.
This restriction will be eliminated in upcoming releases.
Error.errorChangeArray: You cannot change part of an array.
Error.errorMultiCellFormula: Multi-cell array formulas are not allowed in tables.
Error.errorFrmlMaxTextLength:
Text values in formulas are limited to 255 characters.
Use the CONCATENATE function or concatenation operator (&)
Error.errorFrmlMaxLength:
You cannot add this formula as its length exceeded the allowed number of characters.
Please edit it and try again.
Error.errorFrmlMaxReference:
You cannot enter this formula because it has too many values,
cell references, and/or names.
Error.errorDataValidate:
The value you entered is not valid.
A user has restricted values that can be entered into this cell.
Error.errorLockedCellPivot: You cannot change data inside a pivot table.

ContextMenu.errorCopyCutPaste: Copy, cut and paste actions using the context menu will be performed within the current file only.
